Intuitive and Powerful Campaign Design

To stay ahead of the game requires business solutions that simplify your processes and enable sustained and profitable growth. At the same time, every department in your company must work faster, handle more work and manage more change. This requires a shift in strategy from optimising each part of your business to managing your entire end-to-end workflow. Transform your business and enable your digital future with our industry leading Packaging productivity solutions.

Because the Packaging Suite is designed specifically for the packaging industry, it fits what we do out-of-the-box. But with the enhancements EFI has developed over the years, our system is a true hand-in-glove solution.

Jonas Kretz Group IT manager, A&R Carton

Packaging Suite Offerings

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex.

eCRM

The EFI eCRM capabilities extend the impact potential of your EFI management solution to your sales team, making them more productive and efficient. Our suite solutions enable rapid quoting and estimating helping you win more business by automating key administrative tasks.

Learn More →

ERP/MIS System

EFI Radius is a future-ready MIS/ERP solution that is purpose-built for the folding carton, label, and flexible packaging industries. A complete end-to-end business management solution, Radius integrates to a wide range of pre-press and digital print workflow providers.

Learn More →

Scheduling

Intelligently optimize the sequencing of jobs by evaluating the constraints of the production operation with PrintFlow. PrintFlow is a rules-based scheduling solution that allows you to automatically update the schedule to adjust for changes ensuring your production machinery is fully utilised.

Learn More →

Transport Management

Optimize your trailer and reduce carbon footprint with EFI’s space saving trailer planning solution, SmartLinc. Available as an integrated module to EFI Radius, award-winning SmartLinc is designed to streamline and automate shipping processes while optimizing 3rd party shipping.

Learn More →

Estimating

EFI’s iQuote is a highly visual, web-based, JDF-compliant smart estimating software solution that supports all available and emerging technologies in the packaging industry.​ iQuote automates the process of picking the best path for a job through your plant by determining the most cost effective production route.

Learn More →

eCommerce

EFI MarketDirect PackCentral is an online customer ordering portal designed specifically for the requirements of packaging producers. Build and visualise products in powerful 3D tools and connect to EFI’s leading packaging MIS tools to provide seamless order to production automation.

Learn More →

Data Collection

EFI Auto-Count® is an award-winning patented shop floor production intelligence​ platform that allows you to automatically collect accurate, up-to-the minute​ production data including counts, press status, speed and other critical information​ directly from your equipment in real-time.

Learn More →

Business Intelligence

Through an easy-to-use interface, decision-makers gain deep visibility into their business operations with EFI Business Intelligence software. Easily identify trends as they begin to appear, accurately forecast effects of changing variables, and implement proactive measures to maximise profit and efficiency.

Learn More →

Layout & Imposition

EFI Metrix® allows you to dramatically reduce planning and prepress labour cost and shorten job throughput. Metrix enables you to optimise your print tooling and reduce the number of colour changes.

Learn More →

Pre-Press Integration

EFI has successfully integrated with many industry leading 3rd party applications to compliment and enrich the pre-press workflow making it a true ‘end-to-end’ touchless solution.

Learn More →

Digital Printing

Enable digital transformation with EFI's fully integrated JDF workflow. Our end-to-end solution connects to EFI Fiery and other leading 3rd party Digital Front Ends giving our customers a customisable ‘lights out’ solution.

Learn More →
